data.comment: The big names in today's match at Toyota Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Frisco.
In the minute 2, Victor Rivas awards the away team a throw-in.
In Frisco Dallas's Ryan Hollingshead is caught offside.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
In the minute 7, Dallas are coming forward and Franco Jara gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Andres Reyes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Miami.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Miami.
Free kick for Dallas in the half of Miami.
Dallas's Ryan Hollingshead is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Miami's Lewis Morgan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dallas defender.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 22, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Miami to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
Jesus Ferreira for Dallas is whistled offside.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
In the minute 28, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Nicolas Figal for Miami who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Diego Alonso (Miami) has taken off Nicolas Figal who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Dylan Nealis is the replacement.
Free kick Dallas.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dallas drive upfield and Michael Barrios gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Miami defender.
Rodolfo Pizarro scores to make it 0-1 at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 33, Great play from Gonzalo Higuain to set up the goal.
Ryan Hollingshead of Dallas gets in a strike, but is off target.
Miami have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Dallas in the half of Miami.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Throw-in for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 38, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Dallas.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Gonzalo Higuain (Miami) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
The first half has been concluded at Toyota Stadium.
Ben Sweat (Miami) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 47, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Miami.
Michael Barrios (Dallas) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
In the minute 48, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Dallas close to the penalty box.
Rodolfo Pizarro for Miami has been booked by Victor Rivas and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Dallas in the half of Miami.
In the minute 54, Leandro Gonzalez Pirez is booked for the away team.
Dallas are pushing forward but Fafa Picault's finish is wide of the goal.
Victor Rivas awards Miami a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Dallas have been awarded a penalty in Frisco...
Goal! The home team is awarded a penalty in Frisco. Franco Jara converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
Miami drives forward and Gonzalo Higuain gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Miami.
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Blaise Matuidi (Miami) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 65, Fafa Picault (Dallas) strikes at Toyota Stadium but his header is cleared.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Miami at Toyota Stadium.
Miami's Lewis Morgan misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Miami at Toyota Stadium.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami pushes forward through Lewis Morgan, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 71, Miami needs to be cautious. Dallas have an attacking throw-in.
Luchi Gonzalez is making the team's first substitution at Toyota Stadium with Ricardo Pepi replacing Fafa Picault.
In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Alonso (Miami) is making a second substitution, with Victor Ulloa replacing Matias Pellegrini.
Ricardo Pepi for Dallas drives towards goal at Toyota Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, Victor Rivas signals a Dallas throw-in in Miami's half.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Can Dallas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Miami's half?
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Jesus Ferreira with Ema Twumasi. This is the second substitution made today by Luchi Gonzalez.
Dallas take a 2-1 lead thanks to Ryan Hollingshead.
That's a fine assist from Bryan Reynolds.
In the minute 83, Ryan Hollingshead (Dallas) has received a yellow card from Victor Rivas.
Dallas's Ricardo Pepi gets in a shot on goal at Toyota Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Julian Carranza is replacing Wil Trapp for the away team.
In the minute 85, Federico Higuain is replacing Dylan Nealis for Miami at Toyota Stadium.
Dallas make their third substitution with Tanner Tessmann replacing Franco Jara.
In the minute 87, Luchi Gonzalez (Dallas) is making a fourth substitution, with John Nelson replacing Andres Ricaurte.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Throw-in Miami.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Dallas.
Tanner Tessmann (Dallas) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dallas to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Thiago Santos for Dallas is back on the field again.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
Miami's Andres Reyes has been booked in Frisco.
Thiago Santos is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
